message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can call it a day!
A fair split, let's call it a day!
Too even, I want a bit more!
A bit more for me, but still a decent deal for you!
A slight adjustment, but still a fair split!
Not enough for me, I need to take a bigger share!
Take it or leave it! I'm not getting any younger!
I'm still willing to compromise, let's find a middle ground!
Still too little for me, I need to take control!
Last chance, Bob! Take it or walk away!
I'm not giving up yet, let's keep negotiating!
Fine, I'll accept your offer. But don't think this is the end of it!
